title: A Tale of Two Cities - sentences characterized by

content.question: The second and third sentences (“Samples of . . . Hunger”) are primarily characterized by

choices.label: repetitive syntax that provides accumulation of detail
phrases that echo one another in a series of rhymes
disparate images that disorient the reader
independent clauses that contain contrasting images

content.answer: repetitive syntax that provides accumulation of detail

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
